# scnScene

**Instance Property**

The SceneKit scene to render.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var scnScene: SCNScene? { get set }
```

```swift
var scnScene: SCNScene? { get set }
```

## Configuring a 3D Node

- **viewportSize**: The size of the image rendered by the node.
- **pointOfView**: The Scene Kit node from which the scene’s contents are viewed when rendered.
- **autoenablesDefaultLighting**: A Boolean value that determines whether Scene Kit automatically adds lights to a scene.
